name: Small Rhythm Puzzle game
description:
This is a hard puzzle-rhythm game.

Must-read guide to avoid getting confused: In this game, you move to the beat of the music.  1. You use arrow keys to move and should kick a ball to its goal. 2. You can also change environment to rainy or sunny by pressing X. 3. Pressing R resets you and enemy to the starting positions. 4. The player character blinking red means that you moved out of rhythm Moving left does not give you a new animation and it might look annoying.
